title: Wikiwand - List of unproven and disproven cancer treatments
description: This is a non-exhaustive list of alternative treatments that have been promoted to treat or prevent cancer in humans but which lack scientific and medical evidence of effectiveness. In many cases, there is scientific evidence that the alleged treatments are not effective, and in some cases, may even be harmful. Unlike accepted cancer treatments, treatments lacking in evidence of efficacy are generally ignored or avoided by the medical community and are often pseudoscientific.
cleaned_text: List of unproven and disproven cancer treatments List of alternative treatments that have been falsely promoted to treat or prevent cancer / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Dear Wikiwand AI, let's keep it short by simply answering these key questions: Can you list the top facts and stats about List of unproven and disproven cancer treatments? Summarize this article for a 10 years old SHOW ALL QUESTIONS This is a non-exhaustive list of [alternative treatments](/en/Alternative_cancer_treatments) that have been promoted to treat or prevent [cancer](/en/Cancer) in humans but which lack scientific and medical evidence of effectiveness. In many cases, there is scientific evidence that the alleged treatments are not effective, and in some cases, may even be harmful. Unlike [accepted cancer treatments](/en/Management_of_cancer), treatments lacking in evidence of efficacy are generally ignored or avoided by the [medical community](/en/Medical_community) and are often [pseudoscientific](/en/Pseudoscientific). [[1]](#cite_note-pseudoscientific-1) List of alternative treatments that have been falsely promoted to treat or prevent cancer
